COMMENT_TX: $Managers: Joe Torre (New York AL), Bobby Cox (Atlanta NL); MVP: Sandy Alomar (Cleveland AL)

$Randy Johnson's first pitch to Larry Walker sailed over and behind Walker's head; Walker reversed his helmet and moved to the other batter's box for the next pitch then he returned to his normal side
